data.comment: The match is underway in Lyon.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Reims in the half of Lyon.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Reims.
Reims are pushing forward but Moussa Doumbia's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 4, Lyon have a goal kick.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Reims.
In the minute 8, Lyon drive into the zone and Karl Toko Ekambi is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Lyon throw-in in Reims's half.
In the minute 9, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 11, Reims's Mathieu Cafaro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Lyon a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Reims's El Bilal Toure has been booked in Lyon.
Throw-in Lyon.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Reims are caught offside.
In the minute 19, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Goal! Lyon have got their heads in front thanks to a Karl Toko Ekambi strike.
In the minute 22, That's a fine assist from Memphis Depay.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lyon.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Free kick Reims.
Reims's Mathieu Cafaro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lyon defender.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Reims needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 28, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a throw-in for Lyon, close to Reims's area.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Reims.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 31, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
So close for Lyon as Tino Kadewere's shot comes back off the post.
Lyon's Lucas Paqueta misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moreto Cassama (Reims) has been shown a straight red card by referee Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 33, In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lyon push forward at Groupama Stadium and Bruno Guimaraes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Reims defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Lyon are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Reims close to the penalty box.
Mathieu Cafaro of Reims gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, Lyon have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lyon just outside Reims's area.
In the minute 45, Karl Toko Ekambi (Lyon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Reims at Groupama Stadium.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Jerome Miguelgorry awards Reims a goal kick.
Reims's Boulaye Dia gets in a shot on goal at Groupama Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Reims drive upfield and Ghislain Konan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lyon defender.
In the minute 45, Lyon are coming forward and Thiago Mendes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Lyon.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Lyon.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 47, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Bruno Guimaraes extends Lyon's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 49, Great play from Karl Toko Ekambi to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Reims at Groupama Stadium.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick Reims.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Reims.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 55, Jerome Miguelgorry awards Reims a goal kick.
Arber Zeneli is on a sub for Moussa Doumbia for Reims.
Nathanael Mbuku is replacing Boulaye Dia for the away team.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Lucas Paqueta (Lyon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Lyon to check on Lucas Paqueta, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 59, Attention is being given to Reims’s Yunis Abdelhamid and play has been suspended briefly.
Moussa Dembele is replacing Tino Kadewere for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 61, At Groupama Stadium, Reims are penalized for being offside.
Reims's Yunis Abdelhamid looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 62, Lucas Paqueta for Lyon is back on the field again.
Maxwel Cornet is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Lyon.
In Lyon, Reims push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Great finish from Moussa Dembele to give Lyon a 3-0 lead.
Karl Toko Ekambi instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 68, In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Lyon, Lucas Paqueta of Lyon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 71, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lyon.
The home team have replaced Memphis Depay with Rayan Cherki. This is the third substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
The home team replace Marcelo with Sinaly Diomande.
David Guion is making the team's third substitution at Groupama Stadium with Kaj Sierhuis replacing El Bilal Toure.
In the minute 72, Reims make their fourth substitution with Mouhamadou Drammeh replacing Mathieu Cafaro.
Mattia De Sciglio is on a sub for Maxwel Cornet for Lyon.
Lyon's Rayan Cherki breaks free at Groupama Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Lyon.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
In the minute 77, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Arber Zeneli hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Lyon for Reims.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Reims in the half of Lyon.
Lyon drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Reims close to the penalty box.
Can Reims capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Moussa Dembele (Lyon) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Reims.
In the minute 83, Lyon make their fifth substitution with Maxence Caqueret replacing Bruno Guimaraes.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Lyon throw-in in Reims's half.
In the minute 85, Rayan Cherki of Lyon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal kick for Reims at Groupama Stadium.
Lyon are whistled for offside.
In the minute 88, Reims's Kaj Sierhuis misses with an attempt on goal.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Important block from the Reims defence as Lucas Paqueta fires in a strike for Lyon.
In the minute 89, Lucas Paqueta for Lyon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Lyon Lyon attack through Moussa Dembele. The finish is off target, however.
Reims have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Lyon a goal kick.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
